plot: Bashful teacher Suchet is harassed by Lucette, a mischievous pupil, whose main amusement is to ridicule him on the one hand and to make him madly in love with her on the other hand. However...
title: Professeur Cupidon
plot_es: Bashful teacher Suchet is harassed by Lucette, a mischievous pupil, whose main amusement is to ridicule him on the one hand and to make him madly in love with her on the other hand. However...
